scripts.compile: echo "┏━━ Compiling UI" && run up-yarn && run lint && run cleardist && run tsc && run twc && run clearmodules && run up-yarn && echo "┗━━ Done"
scripts.lint:
echo "┣┳━ Running Lint
┃┠─ run lint " && eslint src --max-warnings 10 --color --cache && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.cleardist:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearDist
┃┠─ run rimraf dist" && rimraf dist && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.tsc:
echo "┣┳━ Running Typescript Compiler
┃┠─ run tsc --build" && tsc --build && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.twc:
echo "┣┳━ Running Tailwind Compiler
┃┠─ run tailwindcss -i src/src.css -o dist/styles.css" && tailwindcss -i src/src.css -o dist/styles.css && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.clearmodules:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearModules
┃┠─ run rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/ui" && rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/ui && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.up-yarn:
echo "┣┳━ Updating Dependencies
┃┠─ run yarn dedupe" && yarn dedupe && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.watch1:
echo "┣┳━ Monitoring UI-Libary
┃┠─ tsc --watch" && tsc --watch && echo "┃┗━ Done "
scripts.watch2:
echo "┣┳━ Monitoring Tailwind
┃┠─ tailwindcss -i src/src.css -o dist/styles.css --watch" && tailwindcss -i src/src.css -o dist/styles.css --watch && echo "┃┗━ Done "
scripts.dev: echo "┏━━ Running Dev" && conc watch1 watch2
scripts.lint-cli:
echo "┏━━ Running Lint with CLI Options
┣┳━ Running Lint
┃┠─ run lint --format @microsoft/eslint-formatter-sarif --output-file eslint-results.sarif " && eslint src --color --format @microsoft/eslint-formatter-sarif --output-file eslint-results.sarif && echo "┃┗━ Done
┗━━ Done"
